name: zoho
description: Zoho is a suite of cloud applications including CRM, email marketing, and collaboration tools, enabling businesses to automate and scale operations

tools.name: ZOHO_CONVERT_ZOHO_LEAD
tools.description: Converts a lead into a contact, account, and optionally a deal in Zoho CRM.

lead_id.title: Lead Id
lead_id.description: The unique ID of the lead to convert.

assign_to.title: Assign To
assign_to.description: User ID to assign as the owner of the new contact/account.

overwrite.title: Overwrite
overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite the account name in the contact if it already exists and the company names mismatch.

account_id.title: Account Id
account_id.description: ID of an existing account to associate with the converted lead.

contact_id.title: Contact Id
contact_id.description: ID of an existing contact to associate with the converted lead.

notify_lead_owner.title: Notify Lead Owner
notify_lead_owner.description: Notify the lead owner about the conversion via email.

notify_new_entity_owner.title: Notify New Entity Owner
notify_new_entity_owner.description: Notify the new owner of the contact/account via email.

tools.name: ZOHO_CREATE_ZOHO_RECORD
tools.description: Creates new records in a specified module in Zoho CRM.

data.title: Data
data.description: A list of dictionaries representing the records to be created.

lar_id.title: Lar Id
lar_id.description: The layout ID or lead assignment rule ID (lar_id) to be used if required.

trigger.title: Trigger
trigger.description: List of triggers to invoke during record creation (e.g., ['workflow', 'blueprint']).

module_api_name.title: Module Api Name
module_api_name.description: The API name of the module to create a record in.

tools.name: ZOHO_CREATE_ZOHO_TAG
tools.description: Creates new tags in Zoho CRM.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the tag to be created (max 25 characters).

color_code.title: Color Code
color_code.description: Hex color code for the tag. Must be one of the allowed colors.

module_api_name.title: Module Api Name
module_api_name.description: The API name of the module to create the tag in (e.g., 'Leads').

tools.name: ZOHO_GET_ZOHO_RECORDS
tools.description: Retrieves records from a specified module in Zoho CRM. Notes: - Discrete (page/per_page) pagination is limited to the first 2,000 records. To retrieve records beyond this, use token-based pagination via page_token from the previous response's info.next_page_token. - Do not use page together with page_token. - You cannot use cvid together with sort_by.

ids.title: Ids
ids.description: Comma-separated record IDs to fetch specific records.

cvid.title: Cvid
cvid.description: Custom view ID to filter the records. Cannot be used together with sort_by.

page.title: Page
page.description: Page number to retrieve. Without page_token, only the first 2,000 records are accessible using page/per_page. Maximum page number is floor(2000/per_page). Do not use together with page_token.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Comma-separated API names of the fields to retrieve (max 50). Field names are module-specific. For Contacts module, use valid API names like First_Name, Last_Name, Email, Phone, Mobile, Account_Name, etc. Invalid examples: 'Company', 'Contact_Owner'.

sort_by.title: Sort By
sort_by.description: Field to sort records by (id, Created_Time, or Modified_Time). Cannot be used with cvid.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of records per page (default and max is 200). Applies to both page and page_token pagination.

page_token.title: Page Token
page_token.description: Token-based pagination parameter to fetch records beyond the 2,000-record discrete limit. Use the info.next_page_token from the previous response. Cannot be used together with page.

module_api_name.title: Module Api Name
module_api_name.description: The API name of the module to retrieve records from.

tools.name: ZOHO_UPDATE_RELATED_RECORDS
tools.description: Associates or updates relationships between records across different modules in Zoho CRM.

data.title: Data
data.description: A list of dictionaries representing the related records to update. Each dictionary must include the 'id' of the related record.

record_id.title: Record Id
record_id.description: The unique ID of the parent record.

module_api_name.title: Module Api Name
module_api_name.description: The API name of the parent module (e.g., Leads, Contacts).

related_list_api_name.title: Related List Api Name
related_list_api_name.description: The API name of the related list (e.g., Campaigns, Products).

tools.name: ZOHO_UPDATE_ZOHO_RECORD
tools.description: Updates existing records in a specified module in Zoho CRM.

data.title: Data
data.description: A list of dictionaries representing the records to be updated. Each record must include the 'id' field.

lar_id.title: Lar Id
lar_id.description: Layout ID for the module if required.

trigger.title: Trigger
trigger.description: Comma-separated triggers to invoke during record update (e.g., workflow, blueprint).

wf_trigger.title: Wf Trigger
wf_trigger.description: Whether to trigger workflows during record update.

module_api_name.title: Module Api Name
module_api_name.description: The API name of the module to update records in.
